text: We Ski, also known as Family Ski in Japan and Europe is a video game for the Wii. It is the first third-party game (and second game behind Wii Fit) released that makes use of the Wii Balance Board. A sequel, We Ski & Snowboard, which adds snowboarding to the game, was released in Japan November 13, 2008. ==References== == Other websites == *Official Website *We Ski at IGN Category:2008 video games Category:Bandai Namco games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii games Category:Wii-only games
title: We Ski
